==Chinese==
{{zh-forms|s=反间计|type=21}}

===Etymology===
One of the "defeat stratagems" of the thirty-six strategems: Undermine your enemy's ability to fight by secretly causing discord between him and his friends, allies, advisors, family, commanders, soldiers, and population. While he is preoccupied settling internal disputes, his ability to attack or defend, is compromised.
